job_description:

cover letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Digital Market Developer at Peddy Pet Caring Hero Limited. As a data science student with hands-on experience in AI development, data analytics, and software engineering, I am eager to bring my technical expertise and problem-solving mindset to your team.

My experience spans across AI-driven projects and data analytics roles. During my internship at Resume Page Limited, I developed an AI-powered profile chatbot using Llama and MySQL, improving user engagement by 35%. I also engineered a business card scanner with face recognition, streamlining information exchange by 30%. My prior data analyst internship at IESHER involved analyzing World Bank data to identify policy insights, reinforcing my ability to extract meaningful narratives from complex datasets.

Beyond technical expertise, I am passionate about building impactful solutions. My recent smart fridge platform, developed for a hackathon, integrates inventory tracking with AI-powered recipe recommendations and shopping list generation—demonstrating my ability to merge AI with real-world applications. My leadership experience in tutoring and mentoring has further sharpened my communication and collaboration skills.

I am eager to contribute my analytical skills and AI-driven mindset to Peddy Pet Caring Hero Limited. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your team’s goals. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Christopher Otniel Eleazar

job_description:
• As one of the leading navigation app and smart city tech in Asia, we are seeking a motivated person to join our team to be responsible for managing our spatial data in east Asia excluding China. You will be responsible for: 
• Develop and implement data collection strategies to ensure data accuracy and completeness. 
• Collect, analyze, and manage spatial and transportation data to maintain data accuracy and integrity. 
• Cross-check data with real life observation and user-generated review. 
• Provide support and expertise on spatial data and transportation related matters.

Job Requirements 
• Full-time students, no preference on any major / curriculum / school. 
• Interest on either public transportation, geography, GIS or smart city initiatives is an advantage. 
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and pay attention to details. 
• Not just come here to kill time, brush up the CV or have a regular boring simple job, but rather love to handle dynamic, ever-changing and challenging project tasks. 
• Energetic, fast learner, responsible, self-motivated, able to accomplish deadlines and able to develop himself in an open and entrepreneurial environment. 
• GPA is not an assessment criterion, attitude and enthusiastic in changing people’s lives is the key. 
• Both local and international students are welcome.

job_description:
Summer Internship Program Running from July 2nd to August 23rd, the Internship Program offers comprehensive technical teacher training and an opportunity to be placed in one of the Company's business units based on business requirements and the Intern's preference. Over the course of 8 weeks, Interns will engage in hands-on teaching and participate in practical business events. The Program aims to provide a thorough understanding of the tech education industry by exposing Interns to various aspects of the business; and to enhance Interns’ technical knowledge, communication skills, and business acumen.   What will you experience?  
• On-the-job training to hone programming teaching skills supported by the latest technology such as A.I. recommended teaching metho ds and learning materials  
• Hands on teaching experience on coding for kids, teenagers and/or young adults in a 1:1 or group setting to inspire them programming is part of their daily life in the days ahead  
• Collaborate in content product team on lesson plan ning, material preparation, and progress determination powered by A.I. platforms with data driven approach  
• Involve in projects such as internal training, hackathons, external events in our coffee and wine space and a variety of business activities promoting latest technology trend such as Blockchain, Web 3.0 and ChatGPT  
• Take part in different parts of the business to gain hands-on experience on various business functions with support of latest technologies, platforms and tools  
• Involve in iterating a UX/UI friendly web production system and maintain its operational stability Support and maintain internal har dware, software and systems .  

Job Requirements :  
• Undergraduate students from Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Data Science, Information Technology or related disciplines (Year 3 & 4 preferred)  
Strong enthusiasm and passionate to teach and mentor kid s, teenagers and / or young adults Creative, digital -savvy, detail -minded, proactive with high  
learning agility  
• Good analytical, communication and interpersonal skills Excellent written and  
spoken English

job_description:
Al is a fast-growing and exciting trend that affects everyone in every sector. As an Al product management intern, you will be responsible for some of the following exciting and rewarding tasks: 
Assist in the development of cutting-edge Al products in the education sector 
Collaborate closely with the product team to understand and transiate product requirements into actionable plans 
Support the entire product lifecycle, from conceptualization to launch, by actively contributing to product development and refinement 
Stay updated on Al product market trends and competitor activities to identify potential areas for product innovation and differentiation 
Work in a dynamic startup environment, gaining hands-on experience and exposure to various aspects of product management 
Contribute to cross-functional teams, collaborating with engineers, designers, and other stakeholders to deliver high-quality Al products 
Actively participate in brainstorming sessions and provide valuable insights and ideas to enhance product features and user experience 
Gain valuable Industry experience while working on innovative Al solutions that have the potential to make a significant impact in the education sector  Job Requirements: 
We are seeking a talented and passionate AI Product Management Intern to join our dynamic startup team. In this role, you will have the opportunity to contribute to the development of cutting-edge AI products for the education sector. We look for students with: 
Passion for education and a desire to contribute to the development of transformative AI-powered solutions 
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen interest in AI and its applications 
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team 
Familiarity with product management methodologies and understanding of the product development lifecycle 
Hands-on experience with data analysis, prototyping, and user research would be an advantage 
Pursuance of a degree in a relevant field is a plus

job_description:
As an IT Developer Intern, you will work directly under the guidance of our Project Managers and Technical Consultants to enhance and expand our ERP, inventory, and accounting systems. You will play a critical role in the backend development, ensuring seamless integration and efficient functionality of our systems.

Key Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with project teams to understand and program ERP/CRM systems according to user requirements and business needs.
• Create detailed test plans, scenarios and cases to support effective project delivery.
• Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to ensure adherence to quality standards.
• Assist in debugging, tracking, and resolving software bugs in collaboration with the development team.
• Familiarity with AWS Cloud deployment and API integration is considered a plus.
• Handle ad hoc project assignments as needed.

Job Requirements:

• Previous Python programming experience, particularly in website implementation, API integration, or Odoo applications, is highly advantageous.
• Strong motivation and a keen interest in IT development and Finance solutions.
• Proficiency in both spoken and written English and Chinese.

• Web App design and implementation using React & Next.js Architect,
• Implementation, deployment of native mobile applications on Android and IOS platforms
Third-party service integration

• Database design, development, testing, implementation, enhancement and maintenance

Work closely with UI/UX, product and backend engineering teams.

Job Requirements
• Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Engineering or related disciplines
• Proficiency in any of (HTML, CSS, JavaScript or TypeScript)
• Familiar with any of (Node.js, Next.js, React or React Native)
• Proficiency with Git and version control systems
• Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision
• Passionate in startup culture and environment
Good to have:
• Experience in the core AWS services, including AWS Lambda, AWS Dynamo DB, S3 Bucket, AWS Amplify, EventBridge Scheduler, CloudFormation etc.

• Experience in mobile application development
Having Knowledge of UI/UX design

job_description:
As a software intern you will be assigned to work on of the following areas: 
AWS Amplify Serverless Development  
You will learn how to ReactJS/ CSS (Web Frontend) and AWS Amplify serverless framework to improve user experience within the career simulation portal.  
You will use AWS cloud products like Cognito, DynamoDB, Aurora, SES, S3, 
Cloudfront, Lambda etc.  
You will work closely with Product and Design to build, test and deploy new features. 
WebGL 3D Development (ThreeJS)  
You will learn how to develop a gamified recruitment experience using WebGL 
websites.  
You will use the 3D Software Blender to develop 3D Models.  
You will work multiple visual aspects of a gamified simulation: cameras, 
geometries, user interactions, lights and shadows and shaders etc. 
NodeJS Server Development  
You will learn how to real -time communication functionality using WebSockets.  
You will also integrate MongoDB, a NoSQL database solution, into server -side 
applications. 
Large Language Model Development  
You will learn SOTA prompting techniques such as CoT, TOT prompting.  
You will also develop and refine pretrained large language models. This includes 
exploring new architectures, experimenting with different training approaches, 
and implementing novel techniques to improve model performance.  
WebRTC VoIP Technology (for virtual commun ication)  
You will develop and maintain a real-time communication software using 
WebRTC VoIP Technology.  
You will maintain a TURN server in EC2.  
You will implement peer -to-peer communication in the frontend using ReactJS/ 
Javascript.  
Job Requirements 
• No working experience is required but need to demonstrate strong 
programming capabilities through projects and awards.  
• Knowledge in HTML, CSS, Javascript (ReactJS)  
• Familiar with AWS console environment  
• Familiar with UX/UI Design  
• Fast Learner - you will be constantly learning new frameworks and languages  
• Great problem solver – you will encounter challenges when using new 
technologies  
• A can-do attitude and diligence  
• Good communication skill  
• Major in STEM -related  
• Experience in competitive programming is a plus

job_description:
User Experience Designer Intern: Help Shape the Future of Storius App by Crafting Exceptional User Experiences  Storius  is searching for a talented and passionate User Experience (UX) Designer Intern to join our team! As a UX Designer Intern, you'll have the opportunity to learn from experienced professionals and play a key role in enhancing the usability and appeal of our  app. If you're eager to make an impact and have a keen eye for design, this is the perfect opportunity for you!

• Collaborate with our product and development teams to create user -centered designs for the Storius app  
• Assist in researching and understanding  user needs, behaviors, and motivations to inform design decisions  
• Contribute to the creation of wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes to effectively communicate design ideas and concepts  
• Participate in usability testing, gathering user feedbac k, and using the insights to improve the user experience  
• Help maintain and evolve our design system, ensuring consistency and  coherence across the app  
• Stay up -to-date with the latest design trends and best practices, applying your learnings to create inn ovative and delightful user experiences  
• Work closely with the development team to ensure designs are implemented accurately and effectively  

Job Requirements:  

• A strong interest in user experience design and a desire to learn and grow in the field  
• Basic understanding of UX design principles, methodologies, and best practices  
• Familiarity with design tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, or similar  
• Excellent visual, written, and verbal communication skills  
• Strong attention to detail and a commitme nt to creating high -quality work  
• Ability to work effectively in a collaborative, fast -paced environment  
• A proactive and self -motivated mindset, ready to take initiative and contribute to the team's success  
• Experience with user research, usability testin g, or interaction design is a plus  

Join our dynamic team at Storius and jumpstart your career as a UX Designer while helping shape the future of our app!

job_description:
Job Description: 
Syngular was born in 2021 to help surgeons visualize mixed reality (MR) replicas of patient medical images during operations. Realizing the impact of the aging population and medical workforce shortfall on the healthcare system, there is a huge market potential to improve surgical performance and efficiency to shorten operating time and reduce revision surgery. Syngular provided a 3D modeling pipeline platform to convert medical scan data into holograms that can be visualized in a headset with ultra-low latency. Live video streaming with immersive remote interaction can also be achieved 
We are looking for candidates who are capable of creating a wide range of creative content (3D Models / 2D Textures /Animation / Medical Dicom data) and have a keen passion for making the best user experience for HoloLens or other XR headsets. As a software engineer or engineering trainee, you will be involved in many of the key areas of augmented reality development; from building prototyping features, integrating assets through pipeline tools, and creating interactive scenarios that are realistic and optimized for high frame rates and low latency. You’re a team player and experienced in working with other developers, including Engineers and Designers. This is a fast-paced production environment with the top industrial talents as your peers. You should be proactive and independently driven and strive to take your work from inception to launch. Less experienced candidates may start from handling different mini mobile apps or web-based applications.  
Job Requirements: 
• Integrate assets in Unity game engine without sacrificing artistic vision or exceeding technical limits of minimum specification mobile devices 
• Develop mini mobile app prototype 
• Develop web-based application prototype 
• Monitor and report product development process 
• Follow up with pre and after sales services

job_description:
• We are seeking a talented and innovative App Developer with a strong passion for storytelling and expertise in mobile application development. 
 In this role, you will be responsible for designing, coding, and implementing captivating narrative -driven experiences into our mobile apps.  
 You will collaborate with cross -functional teams to integrate engaging storylines, interactive elements, and user -friendly interfaces.  
 Additionally, you will stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends, leveraging cutting -edge tools and frameworks to enhance the app's performance, usability, and overall user experience.  
 Your technical proficiency, crea tivity, and storytelling skills will contribute to delivering immersive and captivating narrative app experiences to our users. 

Job Requirements: 

• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience in mobile  app development, with a strong portfolio showcasing narrative -driven app projects.  
• Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Swift, or Kotlin.  
• Deep understanding of mobile app development frameworks and platforms (iOS, Android).  
• Strong knowledge of UX/UI principles and best practices.  
• Familiarity with storytelling techniques and experience in integrating narratives into app interfaces.  
• Excellent problem -solving and debugging skills.  
• Ability to work collaboratively in cross -functional teams and communicate effectively.  
• Strong attention to detail and ability to meet project deadlines.  
• Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends related to mobile app development and storytelling.

job_description:
Job Description:
My company is going to hire a Software developer to develop software systems based on project requirement. Your duties will involve around building software by writing code, integrate workflow tools, as well as modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces. You will also participate in various technical tasks including solution design, proposal preparation, presentation, demonstration, software installation and integration, drafting technical documentation

Responsibilities and Duties :
• Develop software systems and Workflow based on project requirements.
• Integrate different (or customise) software systems
• Participate in various technical tasks including solution design, proposal preparation, presentation, demonstration, software installation and integration, etc.
• Draft technical documentation

Job Requirements:

• Have software development experience/knowledge in C/C++/JAVA/PHP or scripting (Python, Powershell)
• Knowledge in networking, OS systems (Windows, Linux, Unix), storage, VM will be added advantages.
• The desire to work in fast -paced environment.
• Confident in communicating with people.
• Good team player but able to work on own initiative and independently
• Have logically thinking and analytical capability to solve the technical challenges
• Enthusiastic and highly self -motivated to acquire new knowledge on product and IT industry
• Self-motivated to complete the job tasks
• Able to work under pressure to meet the project schedule
• Proficient in English and Cantonese

Participate in software design meetings and contribute ideas for improving existing applications or developing new ones. Learn and apply software development best practices and coding standards. Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment. Excellent communication skills and willingness to learn.

job_position: Internship for Computer Vision and Graphics & Deep Learning
job_description:
• Assist and conduct research activities with our postdoctoral researchers for AI  and Machine Learning technology
• Assist our software engineer for developing our product inspection solution.

Job Requirements:
• Interest in computer vision, computer graphics , and deep learning.
• Experience with image processing and computer vision techniques such as 
denoising, object recognition, object detection and segmentation, 3D 
reconstruction.
• Experience with Python.
• Experience with OpenCV and deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow or 
Pytorch.
• Working knowledge of linear algebra, calculus, statistics, and 3D geometry.
• Bonus Requirements: Experiences with C++ (14, 17)
